Description: Lid from a limestone anthropoid sarcophagus; lappet-wig and eye-detail painted black; three columns of Hieroglyphic text from Chapter 72 of the Book of the Dead down the front within a panel. At the foot of the right-hand column is a personal name, Sherit-Isis (?). Green paint survives in the hieroglyphs and on the register-lines. The edge of the lid is has a rebate to fit a lower section of the coffin.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
